question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 19, 8PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Counter-Strike: Fake do Biru vs Sharks (BO3)
description:
This market will resolve to "Fake do Biru" if Fake do Biru win against Sharks in the named Counter-Strike match.

This market will resolve to "Sharks" if Sharks win against Fake do Biru in the Counter-Strike match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from liquipedia: https://liquipedia.net/counterstrike/Main_Page

question: Spread: Temple (-13.5)
description:
In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 18 at 3:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Temple" if Temple win the game by 14 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Charlotte 49ers".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 20, 12AM ET
description:

question: Will Elon Musk post 0-19 tweets from October 21 to October 28, 2025?
description:
This market will resolve according to the number of times Elon Musk (@elonmusk), posts on X from October 21 12:00 PM ET to October 28, 2025 12:00 PM ET.

For the purposes of this market, only main feed posts, quote posts and reposts will count.

Replies will NOT count towards the total - however, replies on the main feed such as https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1786073478711353576 will be counted by the tracker.

Deleted posts will count as long as they remain available long enough to be captured by the tracker (~5 minutes).

Community reposts which are not counted by the tracker not count toward the total.

The resolution source for this market is the 'Post Counter' figure for posts found at https://www.xtracker.io/. Individual posts can be viewed by clicking "Export Data". If the tracker does not update correctly in accordance with the rules, X itself may be used as a secondary resolution source.

For the purposes of this market, only main feed posts, quote posts and reposts will count.

Replies will NOT count towards the total - however, replies on the main feed such as https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1786073478711353576 will be counted by the tracker.

The resolution source for this market is the 'Post Counter' figure for posts found at https://www.xtracker.io/. Individual posts can be viewed by clicking "Export Data". If the tracker does not update correctly in accordance with the rules, X itself may be used as a secondary resolution source.

question: BNP Paribas Nordic Open: Denis Shapovalov vs Casper Ruud
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Denis Shapovalov and Casper Ruud in the BNP Paribas Nordic Open, scheduled for October 18 at 12:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Shapovalov' if Denis Shapovalov advances against Casper Ruud.

This market will resolve to 'Ruud' if Casper Ruud advances against Denis Shapovalov.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: XRP Up or Down - October 20, 12AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the XRP/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Counter-Strike: Wildcard vs Marsborne (BO3)
description:
This market will resolve to "Wildcard" if Wildcard win against Marsborne in the named Counter-Strike match.

This market will resolve to "Marsborne" if Marsborne win against Wildcard in the Counter-Strike match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from liquipedia: https://liquipedia.net/counterstrike/Main_Page

This market will resolve according to the number of times Elon Musk (@elonmusk), posts on X from October 21 12:00 PM ET to October 28, 2025 12:00 PM ET.

For the purposes of this market, only main feed posts, quote posts and reposts will count.

Replies will NOT count towards the total - however, replies on the main feed such as https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1786073478711353576 will be counted by the tracker.

Deleted posts will count as long as they remain available long enough to be captured by the tracker (~5 minutes).

Community reposts which are not counted by the tracker not count toward the total.

The resolution source for this market is the 'Post Counter' figure for posts found at https://www.xtracker.io/. Individual posts can be viewed by clicking "Export Data". If the tracker does not update correctly in accordance with the rules, X itself may be used as a secondary resolution source.

question: Ethereum Up or Down - October 18, 12:00PM-4:00PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the Ethereum price at the end of the time range specified in the title is greater than or equal to the price at the beginning of that range. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Down".
The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the ETH/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/eth-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream ETH/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 20, 1AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Spread: Oilers (-1.5)
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for October 18 at 3:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Oilers" if the Oilers win the game by 2 or more goals.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Devils".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Oilers vs. Devils
events.description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for October 18 at 3:30PM ET:
If the Oilers win, the market will resolve to "Oilers".
If the Devils win, the market will resolve to "Devils".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Getafe win on 2025-10-31?
description:
In the upcoming game, scheduled for October 31, 2025
If Getafe wins, this market will resolve to "Yes".
Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve "No".
This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

question: Mariners vs. Blue Jays
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for October 19 at 8:03PM ET:
If the Seattle Mariners win, the market will resolve to “Mariners”.
If the Toronto Blue Jays win, the market will resolve to “Blue Jays”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Ole Miss vs. Georgia: O/U 57.5
description:
In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 18 at 3:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if Ole Miss and Georgia combine to score 58 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 58, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Ole Miss vs. Georgia
events.description:
In the upcoming CFB game, scheduled for October 18 at 3:30PM ET:

If the Ole Miss win, the market will resolve to "Ole Miss".

If the Georgia win, the market will resolve to "Georgia".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Counter-Strike: Liquid vs Heroic (BO3)
description:
This market will resolve to "Liquid" if Liquid win against Heroic in the named Counter-Strike match.

This market will resolve to "Heroic" if Heroic win against Liquid in the Counter-Strike match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from liquipedia: https://liquipedia.net/counterstrike/Main_Page

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on October 20?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Oct 19 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Oct 20 '25 12:00 ET candle.

question: Pan Pacific Open, Qualification: Alina Charaeva vs Rebecca Sramkova
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Alina Charaeva and Rebecca Sramkova in the Pan Pacific Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 19 at 2:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Charaeva' if Alina Charaeva advances against Rebecca Sramkova.

This market will resolve to 'Sramkova' if Rebecca Sramkova advances against Alina Charaeva.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Guangzhou Open, Qualification: Katie Volynets vs Dominika Salkova
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Katie Volynets and Dominika Salkova in the Guangzhou Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 19 at 2:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Volynets' if Katie Volynets advances against Dominika Salkova.

This market will resolve to 'Salkova' if Dominika Salkova advances against Katie Volynets.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 18 at 3:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if Texas A&M and Arkansas combine to score 58 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 58, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Erste Bank Open: Alejandro Tabilo vs Alexander Bublik
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Alejandro Tabilo and Alexander Bublik in the Erste Bank Open, scheduled for October 20 at 4:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Tabilo' if Alejandro Tabilo advances against Alexander Bublik.

This market will resolve to 'Bublik' if Alexander Bublik advances against Alejandro Tabilo.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 19, 12:00AM-4:00AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the Bitcoin price at the end of the time range specified in the title is greater than or equal to the price at the beginning of that range. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Down".
The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the BTC/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/btc-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream BTC/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 20, 1PM ET
description:

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 20, 5PM ET
description:

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

This market will resolve to "Up" if the Ethereum price at the end of the time range specified in the title is greater than or equal to the price at the beginning of that range. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Down".
The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the ETH/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/eth-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream ETH/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 20, 7PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
